cheatsheet.title: Adding BIRT Features to the Tracker BI Toolkit

intro.description: This cheat sheet will show you how to add BIRT features to the Tracker BI Toolkit product.

item.title: Open Software Updates
item.description:
To browse for BIRT Feature Plugins, open the Software Updates and Add Ons User Inteface.
From the workbench menu:
Help > Software Updates ...

item.title: Show Available Software
item.description: Select the Available Software Tab at the top of the User Interface.

item.title: Select the Ecore ODA Enablement Updates
item.description: Locate the Ecore ODA Enablement Updates entry.

subitem.label: Select the arrow next to the entry name to display all the categories of features.
Select the all the Features in this category.

item.title: Select the BIRT Report Designer Updates
item.description:
Locate the Ganymede entry.
This the main update site for the current Eclipse platform.

subitem.label: Select the arrow next to the entry name to display all the categories of features.
Locate the Charting and Reporting categories of features.
Select the Eclipse BIRT Doc and the Eclipse BIRT Report Designer Framework.

item.title: Install the Features.
item.description:
Select the Install button in the upper right hand corner of the window to install the selected features.
Follow the directions given in the Updates Dialog boxes that follow.
